historyItem.sql: select id acode, name adescription, id || ' - ' || name acodedescription, description, def_ind, ca_utility_pak.get_row_value_or_null('ca_badge_layout', 'id', 'def_ind', 'Y') default_layout, dimension, orientation, type, label_position, pd.printer_description, rotation, unnamed_visitors_ind from ca_badge_layout, ca_printer_dimension pd where (trim(:q) is null or lower(id || ' ' || name) like lower('%' || trim(:q) || '%' )) and pd.printer_code = dimension order by lower(id)
